MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the ML11 postcode area of Forth. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 4:22pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:24pm on 4th January 2021.
